Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition 
(Millage)

Summary:  10 year 1.50 mills property tax for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating, providing and/or supporting an animal shelter for or on behalf of Sabine Parish, including facilities, equipment, services and programs provided by the Sabine Humane Society, Inc.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Sabine, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a one and fifty hundredths (1.50) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $133,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating, providing and/or supporting an animal shelter for or on behalf of the Parish, including facilities, equipment, services and programs provided by the Sabine Humane Society, Inc.?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 20, Ward 9 -- 11.73 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 20, Ward 9 Proposition
(Millage Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 11.73 mills property tax continuation for constructing, improving, maintaining and/or repairing public roads and bridges in Road District No. 20, Ward 9, including ditching and drainage therefor and purchasing of equipment therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 20, Ward 9 of Sabine Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy an eleven and seventy-three hundredths (11.73) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018 (an estimated $10,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and/or repairing public roads and bridges in the District, including ditching and drainage therefor and purchasing of equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: North Sabine Fire Prot. -- 5.38 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
North Sabine Fire Protection District Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 5.38 mills property tax renewal of the North Sabine Fire Protection District for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes.
Race.FullText: Shall North Sabine Fire Protection District of the Parish of Sabine, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a five and thirty-eight hundredths (5.38) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018 (an estimated $140,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
